title: Did Mainstream Media Outlets ‘Refuse’ to Cover Abortion Doctor Ulrich Klopfer?
subtitle: NBC News: "Thousands of fetal remains were found on property in Illinois owned by a recently deceased doctor who performed abortions."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: ABC, CBS, NBC, MSNBC, NPR, PBS all refused to cover abortionist who kept 2,246 aborted babies.
